thread.title: Company Secretary Change

title: Company Secretary Change
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 10, 2015, 18:05 BST - UK Markets closed Company Secretary Change 
St. James’s Place plc (“SJP”) 
Change of Company Secretary 
SJP announces that after 20 years of service with SJP, Hugh Gladman is leaving the Group and therefore resigning as Company Secretary with effect from 9 July. Liz Kelly was appointed as Company Secretary, also with effect from 9 July. 
The Board would like to thank Hugh for his many years of service and wish him well in his new ventures. 
Enquiries: Tony Dunk, Investor Relations Director Tel: 020 7514 1963 View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150710005617/en/ Contact Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
